body_html:
I have a couple other addition requests to this file.
Could you add the changes mentioned in #7836 and #8034 (comment) to the Breaking changes to the API section in 1.0.0 release notes? You can edit the 1.0.0 notes section in place, as these were actual changes made in 1.0.0 but forgotten to be added to the release notes.

In 1.0.1, Let's also mention:
Removed tf.core and tf.python modules from the API. These were never intended to be exposed. Please use the same objects through top-level tf module instead.

Could you add the changes mentioned in #7836 and #8034 (comment) to the Breaking changes to the API section in 1.0.0 release notes? You can edit the 1.0.0 notes section in place, as these were actual changes made in 1.0.0 but forgotten to be added to the release notes.
In 1.0.1, Let's also mention:
Removed tf.core and tf.python modules from the API. These were never intended to be exposed. Please use the same objects through top-level tf module instead.
body:
I have a couple other addition requests to this file.
Could you add the changes mentioned in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7836 and https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/8034#event-986058509 to the `Breaking changes to the API` section in 1.0.0 release notes? You can edit the 1.0.0 notes section in place, as these were actual changes made in 1.0.0 but forgotten to be added to the release notes.

In 1.0.1, Let's also mention:
Removed `tf.core` and `tf.python` modules from the API. These were never intended to be exposed. Please use the same objects through top-level `tf` module instead.
